TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit WriteableBitmap extends System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource
Public NotInheritable Class WriteableBitmap Inherits BitmapSource

summary.span: 提供一个可写入并可更新的 。

span.span: Provides a that can be written to and updated.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用类更新，并呈现在每个帧以位图。Use the class to update and render a bitmap on a per-frame basis. 这是用于生成算法的内容，例如不规则图形图像和数据可视化效果，如音乐可视化工具。This is useful for generating algorithmic content, such as a fractal image, and for data visualization, such as a music visualizer. 类使用两个缓冲区。The class uses two buffers. *后台缓冲区*在系统内存中分配并累积当前未显示的内容。The *back buffer* is allocated in system memory and accumulates content that is not currently displayed. *前台缓冲区*分配在系统内存中，它包含当前显示的内容。The *front buffer* is allocated in system memory and contains the content that is currently displayed. 呈现系统将前台缓冲区复制到视频内存中进行显示。The rendering system copies the front buffer to video memory for display. 两个线程使用这些缓冲区。Two threads use these buffers. *用户界面 (UI) 线程*生成 UI，但不会将其呈现到屏幕。The *user interface (UI) thread* generates the UI but does not present it to the screen. 在 UI 线程响应用户输入、 计时器和其他事件。The UI thread responds to user input, timers, and other events. 应用程序可以具有多个 UI 线程。An application can have multiple UI threads. *呈现线程*撰写和呈现从 UI 线程的变化。The *render thread* composes and renders changes from the UI thread. 没有每个应用程序只有一个呈现线程。There is only one render thread per application. 在 UI 线程将内容写入到后台缓冲区。The UI thread writes content to the back buffer. 呈现线程读取来自前台缓冲区的内容，并将其复制到视频内存。The render thread reads content from the front buffer and copies it to video memory. 对后台缓冲区的更改会跟踪与更改的矩形区域。Changes to the back buffer are tracked with changed rectangular regions. 调用的其中一个重载更新并自动在后台缓冲区中显示内容。Call one of the overloads to update and display content in the back buffer automatically. 更好地控制更新，以及用于多线程访问后台缓冲区，使用以下工作流。For greater control over updates, and for multi-threaded access to the back buffer, use the following workflow. 1. 调用方法来保留后台缓冲区用于更新。Call the method to reserve the back buffer for updates. 2. 通过访问获取指向后台缓冲区的属性。Obtain a pointer to the back buffer by accessing the property. 3. 后台缓冲区将更改写入。Write changes to the back buffer. 其他线程可能会写入更改后台缓冲区时处于锁定状态。Other threads may write changes to the back buffer when the is locked. 4. 调用方法，以指示已更改的区域。Call the method to indicate areas that have changed. 5. 调用方法可释放后台缓冲区，并允许呈现到屏幕。Call the method to release the back buffer and allow presentation to the screen. 当更新发送到呈现线程时，呈现线程将更改的矩形从后台缓冲区复制到前台缓冲区。When updates are sent to the rendering thread, the rendering thread copies the changed rectangles from the back buffer to the front buffer. 呈现系统控制此交换，以避免死锁和重绘项目，如"撕裂"现象。The rendering system controls this exchange to avoid deadlocks and redraw artifacts, such as "tearing". ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何可以用作源的鼠标移动时绘制像素。The following example demonstrates how a can be used as the source of an to draw pixels when the mouse moves. [!code-csharp[WriteableBitmap2#WriteableBitmapFullPage](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/WriteableBitmap2/CS/Program.cs#writeablebitmapfullpage)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 构造函数通过使用此构造函数是首选。The constructor is preferred over using this constructor. 如果`source`不使用本机支持的位图格式，格式转换应用于每个帧更新，这会降低性能。If `source` does not use a natively supported bitmap format, format conversions are applied for each frame update, which reduces performance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 首选的值为`pixelFormat`都和。The preferred values for `pixelFormat` are and . 这些格式以本机方式支持和不需要进行格式转换。These formats are natively supported and do not require a format conversion. 其他`pixelFormat`值要求格式转换为每个帧更新，这会降低性能。Other `pixelFormat` values require a format conversion for each frame update, which reduces performance.

span.span: An representing the area that changed.
Dimensions are in pixels.
Specifies the area of the bitmap that changed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用方法，以指示你的代码具有指向后台缓冲区所做的更改。Call the method to indicate changes your code has made to the back buffer. 时多次调用此方法，更改的区域会累积足够，但不是一定最小，表示形式。When you call this method multiple times, the changed areas are accumulated in a sufficient, but not necessarily minimal, representation. 为提高效率，只有标记为已更新的区域保证副本转发到前台缓冲区。For efficiency, only the areas that are marked as dirty are guaranteed to be copied forward to the front buffer. 但是，位图的任何部分可复制，因此您必须确保整个后台缓冲区将一直有效。However, any portion of the bitmap may be copied forward, so you must ensure that the entire back buffer is always valid. 调用方法调用之间仅并方法，如中所述类备注。Call the method only between calls to the and methods, as described in the class remarks. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何以指定的区域后缓冲，使用更改方法。The following code example shows how to specify the area of the back buffer that changed by using the method. [!code-csharp[WriteableBitmap2#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/WriteableBitmap2/CS/Program.cs#2)]

summary.span: 获取指向后台缓冲区的指针。

span.span: Gets a pointer to the back buffer.

value.span: 一个 ，指向后台缓冲区的基址。

span.span: An that points to the base address of the back buffer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 后台缓冲区包含用户请求的像素格式的位图内容。The back buffer contains the bitmap contents in the pixel format requested by the user. 更新仅之间调用后台缓冲区和方法。Update the back buffer only between calls to the and methods. 如果不遵循锁定/解锁工作流中所述类备注，未定义的行为，例如撕裂现象，可能发生。If you do not follow the Lock/Unlock workflow described in the class remarks, undefined behaviors, such as tearing, can occur. 后台缓冲区的地址不会更改。The address of the back buffer does not change. ## 线程安全Thread Safety 可以将传递指向外部组件和其他线程进行处理，但如果这样做，则必须提供你自己的线程协调。You can pass the pointer to external components and other threads for processing, but if you do, you must provide you own thread coordination. 具体而言，必须确保在 UI 线程通过调用指定更改的区域方法，并在 UI 线程通过调用解锁缓冲区方法。In particular, you must ensure that the UI thread specifies changed areas by calling the method, and that the UI thread unlocks the buffer by calling the method.

summary.span: 保留后台缓冲区用于更新。

span.span: Reserves the back buffer for updates.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法的锁计数递增。The method increments the lock count. 当是锁定，呈现系统不会发送更新直到完全解锁通过调用方法。When a is locked, the rendering system does not send updates until the is fully unlocked by calls to the method. 可以使用方法，以支持多线程的实现。You can use the method to support multi-threaded implementations. 在这些情况下，UI 线程锁定位图，并公开的其他线程的后台缓冲区。In these scenarios, the UI thread locks the bitmap and exposes the back buffer to other threads. 工作线程完成后一个框架，UI 线程将添加更改的矩形，并取消锁定缓冲区。When the worker thread has finished a frame, the UI thread adds changed rectangles and unlocks the buffer. 当呈现线程获取后台缓冲区，以将其前滚复制到前台缓冲区上的锁可以阻止 UI 线程。The UI thread can block when the render thread acquires a lock on the back buffer to copy it forward to the front buffer. 如果此块的延迟时间太长，请使用方法以在短时间等待，然后取消阻止 UI 线程锁定后台缓冲区时执行其他任务。If the latency from this block is too long, use the method to wait for a short time and then unblock the UI thread to perform other tasks while the back buffer is locked. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何通过使用保留后台缓冲区方法。The following code example shows how to reserve the back buffer by using the method. [!code-csharp[WriteableBitmap2#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/WriteableBitmap2/CS/Program.cs#2)]
